actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to extend the coverage of the Federal prohibition against hate crimes in order to provide greater protections to persons who are gay, lesbian, bisexual, or transgender.

summary.text: Amends the federal criminal code to remove the requirement that a hate crime involve conduct in or affecting interstate or foreign commerce.

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to extend the coverage of the Federal prohibition against hate crimes in order to provide greater protections to persons who are gay, lesbian, bisexual, or transgender.
